inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: He is a previously healthy man, working as an engineer in a high tech company.

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Chest X-ray showed infiltrate in the middle of left lung with diameter of 1.8 cm with signs of cavitation.

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: He had traveled to India 1 months ago and has not any positive history of TB vaccination.

exclusion.label: met
exclusion.evidence: He is a previously healthy man, working as an engineer in a high tech company.

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: Chest X-ray showed infiltrate in the middle of left lung with diameter of 1.8 cm with signs of cavitation.

notes: Patient A is a 30-year-old male who was admitted to the hospital after 10 days of cough, profuse nocturnal sweating and loss of appetite. He had traveled to India 1 months ago and has not any positive history of TB vaccination.
